doc.name: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008
doc.citation: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Income Tax (Managed Investment
         Trust Transitional) Act 2008.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act commences on the day on which it receives the Royal
         Assent.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008 > Section 3
chunks.text:
The tax known as income tax, to the extent that that tax is
         payable by an entity in accordance with section 840-805 of the
         Income Tax (Transitional Provisions) Act 1997, is imposed on
         amounts to which that section applies.

chunks.title: Section 4 - Rate of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Managed Investment Trust Transitional) Act 2008 > Section 4
chunks.text:
The rate of income tax imposed by this Act is 22.5%.
[Minister's second reading speech made in-
House of Representatives on 4 June 2008
Senate on 18 June 2008]
(123/08)
